name: Rayman - Hoodlum's Revenge [GBA]
description: Rayman: Hoodlums' Revenge (alternatively Rayman: Hoodlum's Revenge) is a game that was released for the Game Boy Advance in 2005. It takes place shortly after the events of Rayman 3: Hoodlum Havoc and, like its predecessor, pokes fun at the platformer video game genre.
